dimensions: Warp: 145 cm (57 1/4 in.). Weft: 100 cm (39 1/2 in.). Pieced with two seams in the center.
title: Neptune, ou la maitrise des mers (Neptune or the Mastery of the Sea)
medium:
Medium: cotton 
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
description: Assortment of maritime and patriotic scenes as well as a Chinese pavilion. Neptune in a chariot gives orders to Mercury and Pallas Athena. A child holding a book titles "Nouvelle Loi" (new Law) stands beside them. There is a scene apparently granting freedom to three slaves which may coincide with the first abolition of slavery in 1794. In red on white.
name: Textile
